description:
Stay warm on chilly belays, backcountry ski transitions or winter camping trips in a technical down jacket. The Neutrino Pro Jacket is filled with premium water-repellent down to keep you warm in any weather. Its lightweight outer shell and lining are treated with a DWR finish to protect you from wind and rain showers. The hood is helmet-compatible and has a stiffened peak, so it doesn't get floppy and obscure your field of view. A 2-way zipper lets you open it from the bottom when it's your turn to belay, and an internal storm flap keeps the weather out. On warmer summer trips, bring it along in its stuff sack (included), then pull it out at night for cozy insulation while gazing at meteor showers under clear mountain skies.

  • Lightweight Pertex® Quantum Pro nylon shell packs down small and provides excellent water and wind resistance
  • Premium 800-fill-power Nikwax Hydrophobic goose down insulation dries faster, maintains loft better and retains less moisture than traditional down
  • Insulation meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare
  • Helmet-compatible adjustable hood has a wired brim that won't droop into your eyes
  • 2-way YKK zip can be opened from the bottom to access your belay device and has an internal storm flap
  • 2 zippered hand pockets and an internal zippered pocket hold small essentials
  • Low-profile elastic cuffs and drawcord hem seal in heat
  • Includes a stuff sack for easy storage in your backpack when conditions warm up
name: Rab Neutrino Pro Jacket - Men's
